name: up the roots
description:
This game takes some time to load, please be patient!!!

Explore a post-apocalyptic city through the eyes of a small tree-spirit. Climbing on roots and gliding between giant skyscrapers, you travel further and further guided by your forest magic, leading you to leftovers of the extinct civilization.

Keyboard ButtonGamePad ButtonFunctionW,A,S,DLeft Analog Stick
Move aroundSpace Xbox A/PS Cross
Jump / Hold to floatShift Left Trigger on Gamepad
Hold to sprint

This game was developed during the 2023 Global Game Jam
